id: DiagnosticReportPatientSearch

contact: HL7 International Clinical Interoperability Council: http://www.hl7.org/Special/committees/cic,ciclist@lists.HL7.org

description: This search parameter searches for diagnostic reports with a given patient as its subject.

jurisdiction: United States of America

code: patient

base: DiagnosticReport

type: reference

expression: DiagnosticReport.subject.where(resolve() is Patient)

xpath: f:DiagnosticReport/f:subject

xpathUsage: normal

target: Patient, Group

multipleOr: true

multipleAnd: true

modifier: missing, type, identifier

name: MCODEDiagnosticReportPatient
description: This search parameter searches for diagnostic reports with a given patient as its subject.
